summary: A man with imagination opposes a society without it. Society forces him to betray his freedom-loving spirit, but imagination is immortal.
cast: Oleg Yankovskiy|Inna Churikova|Elena Koreneva|Igor Kvasha|Aleksandr Abdulov|Leonid Yarmolnik|Yuriy Katin-Yartsev|Vladimir Dolinskiy|Leonid Bronevoy|Semyon Farada|Vsevolod Larionov|A. Amaslyuryants|A. Myulstedt|G. Oshkolup|Nina Palladina|Oleg Sokolov|K. Yu. Stejman|Vladimir Yanovskis|Igor Yasulovich|Vladimir Aleksandrov|Ye. Vinttsen|Grigoriy Malikov|Yuriy Martynov|K. Nitts|Lyubov Polishchuk|Anatoliy Skoryakin|M. Khokharina|Sergei Torkachevsky|Vladimir Firsov|Evgeniy Markov
title: Tot samyy Myunkhgauzen
